name: VR Skydiving
description:
Welcome to our spaceship! You can choose different landscape scenes on the Earth, including mountains, deserts, and Gobi deserts etc. By pressing the touchpad and the trigger of the left controller for selection. Using the touchpad of your right controller for movement. Choose your parachute, then you are ready to go! Our phoenix will take you fly freely to explore the landscape in the sky. You can land with a parachute where you are interested by pressing the menu button of the left controller. There is a treasure chest in each landscape scenes, find it! Guess what you can get!
Enjoy your journey!

instructions:
By pressing the touchpad and the trigger of the left controller for selection.
Using the touchpad of your right controller for movement.
